attributes.action: David Cameron should not pay the EU another penny and have an immediate referendum and abide by the people's vote
attributes.additional_details:
that the reported 1.7Bn payment to the EU is not paid we have an immediate referendum and the government abides by the peoples decision.
Enough is Enough

rejection.details:
Please see the following petition:

Petition Title: should there be a referendum for the UK pay £1.7b extra to the EU

Created by: Jonathan Berwick

Closing: 30/03/2015
